# C++ Prime Iterator
Fast && Memory efficient

```shell
$ g++ -O3 prime-iterator.cpp -o prime-iterator
$ time ./prime-iterator 1000000000
Found 50,847,534 Primes <= 1,000,000,000

real	0m2.097s
user	0m1.809s
sys	0m0.288s
$ time ./prime-iterator 1000000000 0
6573 : 6573 2 to 65535
12760 : 6187 65541 to 131067
18712 : 5952 131077 to 196605
24581 : 5869 196611 to 262143
30308 : 5727 262153 to 327673
90175 : 5280 983061 to 1048575
95449 : 5274 1048585 to 1114107
100706 : 5257 1114113 to 1179637
105912 : 5206 1179651 to 1245175
3563936 : 4230 52363285 to 52428795
6879641 : 4125 104792071 to 104857587
10116572 : 3992 157220865 to 157286397
13303523 : 3912 209649673 to 209715183
...
58864350 : 3674 996081705 to 996147193
Found 59082145 Primes <= 1000000000

real	0m2.227s
user	0m2.215s
sys	0m0.004s

$ time ./prime-iterator 1000000000 999000000
1437 : 1437 999000011 to 999030779
4572 : 3135 999030793 to 999096299
...
45471 : 3165 999882757 to 999948269
47957 : 3154 999948289 to 1000013801

Found 47957 Primes <= 1000000000

real	0m0.063s
user	0m0.062s
sys	0m0.001s
```
